event.description:
Last year we added the cooking classes to our array of special events.

If  you love your pasta this night is for you?  One of our talented chefs will  takes you through a simple pasta recipe which will enable you to make your own spaghetti, fettuccine, linguine or pappardelle.

This class is an interactive class where patrons are invited to join in and get their hands dirty and  they also get to the taste the fruits of their labour at the end of the night.

There is no fee as such, but patrons are requested to order at least one main meal from the a la carte menu.

To add to an excellent evening our Italian trio, "Bella Ciao" , will be performing some classic Italian songs in their unique style. Make sure you have your toe tapping shoes on as their music is quite infectious! 
 
Time : 6:30pm Music starts
Cooking Class : 7.15pm
A la carte dining
Bookings essential
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.title: Cooking Class - Howto make fresh pasta.

event.description:
We all know mum has a special place in our hearts so on Mother's Day we give back a little love, a few extra hugs and say thanks for everything they do. So make sure there's no cooking for mum or nonna and treat her to an awesome day.

At La Camera every care is taken to see that mum has the most enjoyable day of the year. We add a little sparkling wine and a special present.

Reserve your table asap:

$70 3 course set menu for balcony seating
A la carte menu available inside or optional $65 set menu.**
Kids menu available.

**set menu applies for bookings of 10 or more
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.title: Mother's Day

event.description:
After 12 years of delighting La Camera Southgate patrons, our very popular "Opera Night" is back in May led by the most talented and very eccentric Tamara Vasilevitsky (Concert pianist). Judging by our Three Tenors night in March it seems as though The Opera nights will be a hit again in 2017.

Tamara will lead the way with her beautiful tunes and throughout the night you can be assued that her mum will join her in what can be only explained as a breathtaking experience.

Throughout the night our Opera singers will partake in a number of sets in a close an intimate performance where the patrons get involved with their swinging glasses and waving handkerchiefs.

If you love your Opera, music and the most entertaining of evenings, then this night is for you.

$60 3 course set menu

Bookings close 25th of May.
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
event.title: Opera Spectacular

event.description:
Just like Chinese Yum Cha, Including bamboo baskets and trolleys, but with Italian food. 

Over five years ago La Camera Southgate introduced the first Italian Yum Cha event. Over the years we are flattered that many other restaurants have copied our innovative nights.

A fantastic way to test many dishes on our menu...antipasti, pasta, risotto, pizza, salads, mains, antipasti, dessert.

Get ready for the best Italain Yum cha since its inception.Reserve your table soon as this will be limited to 120 patrons.

Book your table via ticket link below or call 9699 3600 for more information.


Options:
Dishes commence at $6 per dish

#italianyumcha #iloveitalainfood #pasta #pizza #risotto #antipasti #dessert
